'''''The Ship Has It''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the Ship Success version of ''[[Problem Conversion: Loading Capacity]]'' after giving Rafiq 5 planks during ''[[Problem Conversion: Theory Reliability]]''.
